Message:
The bad man who took
my red away from me—

But, if I soak him in a bright,
pretty red...maybe I’ll like him.

It was then that a man with
a staff appeared in front of me.

He wasn’t in red...but he still
had a beautiful color.
He got my <ct=3000>red</ct> apple back for me.

“Yeah, you’re right, Emma.
He was a really nice man.”
